languages.text: К моменту прибытия {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости сервиторы продолжали находиться в той же позиции, которую заняли при поступлении в отсек: выстроившись в длинную цепь в форме спирали и обратившись лицами к центру странной формации. Спустя мгновение после того, как {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость переступил{mf||а} порог входных врат, тела пришли в движение: словно по команде сервиторы развернулись к Лорд-капитану! Наблюдающие за содержанием дефективных единиц техноматы даже схватились за оружие, однако сервиторы замерли, уставившись пустыми глазами на {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость.

traits.locale_text: К моменту прибытия {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости сервиторы продолжали находиться в той же позиции, которую заняли при поступлении в отсек: выстроившись в длинную цепь в форме спирали и обратившись лицами к центру странной формации. Спустя мгновение после того, как {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость переступил{mf||а} порог входных врат, тела пришли в движение: словно по команде сервиторы развернулись к Лорд-капитану! Наблюдающие за содержанием дефективных единиц техноматы даже схватились за оружие, однако сервиторы замерли, уставившись пустыми глазами на {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость.

languages.text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.
languages.original_text: К моменту прибытия {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости сервиторы продолжали находиться в той же позиции, которую заняли при поступлении в отсек: выстроившись в длинную цепь в форме спирали и обратившись лицами к центру странной формации. traits.locale_text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

languages.text: 陛下が現場に到着したとき、サーヴィターたちはベイに集められた後と同じ位置にいた。すべてが長いらせん状の列をなしており、奇妙な陣形の中心を向いて立っていた。陛下がベイの扉を越えた瞬間、彼らの体は動き出した。まるで命令に従うかのように、サーヴィターたちは一斉に、一体となってロード・キャプテンの方を向いた！サーヴィターの不良ユニットを監視するテクノマットたちは武器を取ろうとしたが、その後、サーヴィターたちは同じように急に静止し、陛下をぼんやりとした目で見つめていた。
languages.original_text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

traits.locale_text: 陛下が現場に到着したとき、サーヴィターたちはベイに集められた後と同じ位置にいた。すべてが長いらせん状の列をなしており、奇妙な陣形の中心を向いて立っていた。陛下がベイの扉を越えた瞬間、彼らの体は動き出した。まるで命令に従うかのように、サーヴィターたちは一斉に、一体となってロード・キャプテンの方を向いた！サーヴィターの不良ユニットを監視するテクノマットたちは武器を取ろうとしたが、その後、サーヴィターたちは同じように急に静止し、陛下をぼんやりとした目で見つめていた。

languages.text: Quand {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} arriva sur place, {mf|il|elle} trouva les servitors dans la position qu'ils avaient prise après avoir été rassemblés dans la baie : disposés en spirale, tous tournés vers le centre de leur étrange formation. Dès l'instant où Sa Seigneurie pénétra dans la baie, leurs corps s'animèrent : tous ensemble, comme s'ils obéissaient à un ordre, les servitors se tournèrent pour lui faire face ! Les technomates chargés de surveiller les unités défectueuses voulurent même se saisir de leurs armes, mais soudain, les servitors s'immobilisèrent aussi vite qu'ils avaient bougé, fixant {name} de leur regard vide.
languages.original_text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

traits.locale_text: Quand {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} arriva sur place, {mf|il|elle} trouva les servitors dans la position qu'ils avaient prise après avoir été rassemblés dans la baie : disposés en spirale, tous tournés vers le centre de leur étrange formation. Dès l'instant où Sa Seigneurie pénétra dans la baie, leurs corps s'animèrent : tous ensemble, comme s'ils obéissaient à un ordre, les servitors se tournèrent pour lui faire face ! Les technomates chargés de surveiller les unités défectueuses voulurent même se saisir de leurs armes, mais soudain, les servitors s'immobilisèrent aussi vite qu'ils avaient bougé, fixant {name} de leur regard vide.

languages.text: 当舰长大人抵达现场时，所有机仆依然保持着他们刚刚被集中到这片区域时的姿势。他们排着长队，组成了一条螺旋形的队伍，面对着古怪队伍的中心区域。然而，当舰长大人跨过大门的那一刻，所有机仆的身体猛地动了起来。他们转过了身，面对着舰长大人，就好像在服从命令一样。负责监督故障机仆的技工甚至都伸手去拿武器了，但随后，这些机仆再次静止不动，以空洞的眼神盯着舰长大人。
languages.original_text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

traits.locale_text: 当舰长大人抵达现场时，所有奴工依然保持着他们刚刚被集中到这片区域时的姿势。他们排着长队，组成了一条螺旋形的队伍，面对着古怪队伍的中心区域。然而，当舰长大人跨过大门的那一刻，所有奴工的身体猛地动了起来。他们转过了身，面对着舰长大人，就好像在服从命令一样。负责监督故障奴工的技工甚至都伸手去拿武器了，但随后，这些奴工再次静止不动，以空洞的眼神盯着舰长大人。

languages.text: Cuando mi{mf|lord|lady} llegó a la escena, encontró a los servidores en la misma posición que habían tomado después de haber sido guiados hasta la bahía: en pie, formando una línea en espiral y mirando al centro de su extraña formación. En cuanto mi{mf|lord|lady} cruzó el umbral de la puerta de la bahía, sus cuerpos se movieron bruscamente: ¡al unísono, como obedeciendo una orden, los servidores se giraron para mirar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Los tecnómatas encargados de la supervisión de las unidades defectuosas llegaron a poner las manos sobre sus armas, pero los servidores volvieron a quedarse inmóviles de forma igual de repentina, fijando sus miradas vacías en mi{mf|lord|lady}.
languages.original_text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

traits.locale_text: Cuando mi{mf|lord|lady} llegó a la escena, encontró a los servidores en la misma posición que habían tomado después de haber sido guiados hasta la bahía: en pie, formando una línea en espiral y mirando al centro de su extraña formación. En cuanto mi{mf|lord|lady} cruzó el umbral de la puerta de la bahía, sus cuerpos se movieron bruscamente: ¡al unísono, como obedeciendo una orden, los servidores se giraron para mirar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Los tecnómatas encargados de la supervisión de las unidades defectuosas llegaron a poner las manos sobre sus armas, pero los servidores volvieron a quedarse inmóviles de forma igual de repentina, fijando sus miradas vacías en mi{mf|lord|lady}.

languages.text: Als {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} am Ort des Geschehens eintraf, fand {mf|er|sie} die Servitoren noch immer in derselben Position vor, die sie eingenommen hatten, nachdem sie in das Modul getrieben worden waren. Sie standen alle in einer langen, zu einer Spirale gewundenen Reihe und blickten zum Mittelpunkt ihrer merkwürdigen Formation. Sobald {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} die Stufe des Modultors überquerte, erwachten ihre Körper. Wie auf einen Befehl hin drehten sich die Servitoren absolut synchron in Richtung des Lord Captains um! Die Technomaten, die den Befehl hatten, die fehlerhaften Einheiten zu beaufsichtigen, griffen sogar nach ihren Waffen. Dann aber blieben die Servitoren wieder ebenso abrupt stehen und starrten {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} mit leeren Augen an.
languages.original_text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

traits.locale_text: Als {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} am Ort des Geschehens eintraf, fand {mf|er|sie} die Servitoren noch immer in derselben Position vor, die sie eingenommen hatten, nachdem sie in das Modul getrieben worden waren. Sie standen alle in einer langen, zu einer Spirale gewundenen Reihe und blickten zum Mittelpunkt ihrer merkwürdigen Formation. Sobald {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} die Stufe des Modultors überquerte, erwachten ihre Körper. Die Technomaten, die den Befehl hatten, die fehlerhaften Einheiten zu beaufsichtigen, griffen sogar nach ihren Waffen. Dann aber blieben die Servitoren wieder ebenso abrupt stehen und starrten {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} mit leeren Augen an.

languages.text: {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri olay yerine teşrif ettiğinde hizmetörler, bölmeye alındıkları gün bulundukları yerlerdeydi. Her biri bir sarmalın parçaları gibi dizilmiş, oluşturdukları tuhaf yapının merkezine bakıyordu. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri bölme kapısının eşiğinden geçer geçmez hizmetörler hep birden hareket etmeye başladı. Emir gelmiş gibi hepsi yüzünü Lord Kaptan'a çevirdi! Defolu birimleri gözetmekle görevli teknomatlar silahlarına dahi davrandı. Sonrasında hizmetörler bir anda duraksayıp {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne boş gözlerle bakmaya başladılar.
languages.original_text: When {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} arrived at the scene, {mf|he|she} found the servitors in the same position that they assumed after they had been corralled into the bay: all standing in a long spiralling line and facing the centre of their strange formation. The moment {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} crossed the threshold of the bay gate, their bodies jerked into motion: all as one, as if obeying a command, the servitors turned to face the Lord Captain! The technomats tasked with overseeing the defective units even reached for their weapons, but then the servitors went still just as abruptly, staring at {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with vacant eyes.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri olay yerine teşrif ettiğinde hizmetörler, bölmeye alındıkları gün bulundukları yerlerdeydi. Her biri bir sarmalın parçaları gibi dizilmiş ve oluşturdukları tuhaf yapının merkezine bakıyordu. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri bölme kapısının eşiğinden geçer geçmez hizmetörler hep birden hareket etmeye başladı. Emir gelmiş gibi hepsi yüzünü Lord Kaptan'a çevirdi! Defolu birimleri gözetmekle görevli teknomatlar silahlarına dahi davrandı ama hizmetörler bir anda duraksayıp {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne boş gözlerle bakmaya başladılar.
